name: Antenna Man
description: A game about being a robot, meeting a girl, and falling in love.... Aww how cu.......... wait a second, robot can't feel human emotions! Figure out what this strange feeling is and carry on with whatever you were doing before. A to move left, D to move right, and some areas you need to click around for stuff. This entire game was based off 1 line in Cabinet Man by Lemon Demon. "This must be what love would have felt like."  I made everything, including the music.
